translations: n.轮廓，外形；轮廓图，草图；提纲，大纲；梗概，要点；（词的）速记形式
v.概述，略述；勾勒，描画……的轮廓

sentences.sentence: She drew the figures in outline.
sentences.translation: 她简略地勾勒出人物的轮廓。

sentences.sentence: Trees soften the outline of the house.
sentences.translation: 树木使房子的轮廓显得柔和。

sentences.sentence: At last we could see the dim outline of an island.
sentences.translation: 我们终于能看到一小岛朦胧的轮廓了。
